subject: 2007 Lucky Winner Congratulations!!!
body:
FROM:ACCULOTTO.COM INTERNATIONAL
OFFICIAL SPONSOR:MERCEDES BENZ COPERATION(UK)
C/ CRYDON 28089,LONDON.
FROM: THE PROMOTIONS DIRECTOR
INTERNATIONAL PROMOTIONS DEPT.
www.acculotto.com 
                          
Dear Winner

We are pleased to inform you of the final announcement today, 23rd of 
June, 2007 of winners of the ACCU LOTTERY ONLINE PROMO 
PROGRAMME, held on the 20th of June, 2007.
Your e-mail address attached to ticket number: AL-56875600545 188 with 
Serial number  AL-5368/02. drew the lucky numbers:AL-01-14-21-3-35-49, and a 
bonus number of 24 which subsequently won you the lottery in the second 
category.You have therefore been approved to claim a total sum of 
1.700.000 POUNDS (ONE MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED THOUSAND POUNDS.
in cash credited to KTU/9023118308/03 and a brand new Mecerdes Benz Car. 

PROCEDURES FOR CLAIMS
CONTACT OUR FIDUCIARY AGENT BY EMAIL.
DR. MRS LAURA GREEN (Foreign Transfer Manager)
TRUST MANAGEMENT AND FINANCE BV.
ACCULOTTO.COM CLAIMING SECURITY AGENCY.
C/ CRYDON 28089,UK
Tel:+447031942470
Email: info.accu11@sify.com

VERIFICATION FORM
1.Full Names..................
2.Residential Address............For Delivery
3.Phone Number............
4.Fax Number...............
5.Occupation................
6.Sex..........................
7.Age...........................
8.Nationality.................

Congratulations once more from all members and staffs of this program.
Thank you for being part of our online promotional lottery program.   
Yours Sincerely,
Mr.LOUIS GREY.

ACCULOTTO.COM/LOTTERY CO-ORDINATOR
OFFICIAL SPONSOR:MERCEDES BENZ MOTOR COPERATION (UK)
